comment._content: Cormons on Wikipedia, in the "Province of Gorizia in the Italian region Friuli-Venezia Giulia, located about 45 km northwest of Trieste."

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Annexed by Italy when it entered the war in 1915, then retaken by the Austro-Hungarians, then given to Italy after the war, where it remains.
